summary: Matt Furie’s famous angry monkey turned Chinese - In a bustling digital jungle, where memes reign supreme and cryptocurrencies thrive, MONKEI was born. Inspired by the legendary 'Angry Monkey,' our beloved character has undergone a cultural metamorphosis, blending traditional aesthetics with modern meme culture. MONKEI symbolizes the perfect fusion of East and West, bringing together a global community of meme lovers and crypto enthusiasts.
